metadata.title: CVE-2022-39328 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Grafana is an open-source platform for monitoring and observability.Versions starting with 9.2.0 and less than 9.2.4 contain a race conditionin the authentication middlewares logic which may allow an unauthenticateduser to query an administration endpoint under heavy load. This issue ispatched in 9.2.4. There are no known workarounds.

criterions.comment: grafana package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
